name: Spooky Scary Recreational Pastime
description:
A little platformer game focused on puzzle-solving. 

There are 2 unique actions available to players - Wall Bouncing and Creating Platform. 

When the player is touching a vertical wall with rough surface, if the Jump button is pressed, a Wall Bounce is performed, pushing the player to the left or right side depending on the location of the rough surface (eg. if rough surface is on the left of the wall, the player will be bounced to the left side).

The player can also collect white orbs, which gives them the ability to create a white platform that they can stand on, and block enemy projectiles. 

If you encounter the problem of page scrolling while playing, please go into fullscreen by pressing the icon on the bottom-right of the game screen!
